content: Yes, using electronic devices before bed can definitely make it harder to fall asleep and get a restful night's sleep. Breaking the habit can be challenging, but it's important to establish healthy boundaries and stick to them. You could try things like putting your phone on the other side of the room, using a traditional alarm clock instead of your phone, or finding other activities to do before bed like reading a book or taking a warm bath. Remember, the benefits of getting a good night's sleep are worth the effort!
